noAvailable: This team has been deleted or is no longer available.

message.acceptSuccess: Invitation accepted successfully. You are now a member of the team.
message.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later or contact support.
message.acceptFailed: Failed to accept invitation. Please try again.
message.declineFailed: Failed to decline invitation. Please try again.
message.serverErrorProcessed: Server error occurred. The invitation may have already been processed. Please check your team status.
message.contactSupportProcessed: Server error occurred. The invitation may have already been processed. Please check your team status or contact support if the issue persists.
message.invalidRequest: Invalid request. The invitation may have expired or already been processed.
message.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
message.processing: Please wait while we process your request.
message.invalidLinkNoToken: Invalid invitation link. No token provided.
message.invalidLinkNoEmail: Invalid invitation link. Email is missing. Please use the link from your invitation email.
